title: The Sopranos Complete Series Box Set Drops To Lowest Price Ever

description:
Three-time Oscar-winning director Guillermo del Toro has revealed some of his favorite video games, including BioShock, Death Stranding, Red Dead Redemption, and God of War, among others.

Appearing on the Happy Sad Confused podcast, del Toro said Sony's God of War series had some of the "best cinematic experiences" he's ever witnessed.

"When [Kratos] fights Odin [in God of War Ragnarok] and Odin keeps coming back and he looks like a Peaky Blinders brawler. He beats the crap out of Kratos. What a great video game. And the way they use the budget of data on the console to create atmospheric dispersion and light. That is lit like a film," he said.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Oscar-Winning Director Guillermo del Toro Reveals His Favorite Games, Including A "Masterpiece"

description:
Grand Theft Auto Online players are going to live the high life in the game's latest update, A Safehouse in the Hills. For the first time, the game is letting users purchase one of three luxury estates in and around Los Santos and all of the amenities that come with them. It arrives alongside the new Grand Theft Auto 5 Title Update 1.72, the full patch notes for which you can see below.

Each of the three mansions--The Richman Villa, Tongva Estate, and Vinewood Residence--have their own perks and visual identities. But all of the mansions come with a fast-travel ability that lets players go from the lap of luxury to any of their other properties in the city without the hassle of driving.

Players can take remote work to the next level by using a master control termin
title: GTA Online's Big New Update With Michael DLC Mission Is Out Now, See The Full Patch Notes

description:
A new update has arrived to both Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone. The patch notes for the December 10 update detail various bug fixes and improvements across all modes, but some of the changes are a disappointment for Zombies players.

A few bugs are squashed for Season 1's new Astra Malorum Zombies map. The patch notes address an issue where Oscar could become stuck in the starting area, and it also fixes the map's new LGM-1 Wonder Weapon, which could sometimes fire with unintended behavior when paired with certain GobbleGums and the Frenzied Fire augment. Unfortunately, this also affects a strategy players were using to help make the Wonder Weapon more powerful during the tough
title: CoD: Black Ops 7 And Warzone Update Won't Make Zombies Players Happy

description:
The Game Awards are just around the corner, and while this time of year is surely exciting for all the nominees--and those of us eager for new game announcements--this year, there is one studio in particular that has more reason than any to celebrate: Sandfall Interactive.

Earlier this year, the small-scale studio took the world by storm with its debut title, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33. Despite being Sandfall's first game, the narrative-driven, turn-based RPG quickly entered the pantheon of all-time greatest RPGs, earning nearly universal critical acclaim for its artistry, story, and espousal of mechanics and themes typically associated with Japanese RPGs.

Now, Sandfall Interactive stands poised to make The Game Awards history
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Team Had "A Lot Of Arguments" About The Game's Ending

description:
Overwatch 2 Season 20 has arrived, marking the addition of the first melee-focused DPS hero to the roster, Vendetta. This is technically not the first time Blizzard has attempted a melee-focused DPS hero, as Doomfist was originally in that role before being reworked into a tank. Vendetta wields her massive Palatine Fang greatsword to slice through enemies.

The Season 20 battle pass has a loose winter theme. It includes skins like Yukizaru Genji, Colder: 76 Soldier: 76, Winter Guardian Illari, and Skadi Freja. All of these skins feature characters bundled up in winter clothing with blue-and-white color schemes. The battle pass also included Mythic Shards, which can be used to get the new Mythic Divine Desperado Cassidy skin or Capsule Cannon Orisa weapon skin.

The premium battle pass, whic
title: Overwatch 2 Battle Pass Season 20: All Skins, Emotes, And Rewards

description:
Come gather around The Ghoul Log, a festive video that the Fallout TV show has created in the lead-up to Season 2. Starting with The Ghoul (Walton Goggins), this holiday special features Dogmeat and shows a human arm--"specifically, a fat man's"--burning in a fireplace for roughly an hour and a half.

On YouTube, Prime Video released the officially titled Fallout: The Ghoul Log, which can be seen below. The Ghoul makes a couple of revelations about the wasteland early on. First up, he says, "Well, this ain't no Whoville," implying The Grinch is part of that universe. Funnily enough, Goggins portrays The Grinch in a Walmart ad campaign this holiday season. And sadly, The Ghoul notes that Santa Claus doesn't exist in the wasteland.
title: Fallout Gets You In The Festive Spirit Before Season 2 Drops Next Week

description:
However it might feel as a year goes on, when it comes time to take stock of the best games of the year, there are always so many games. It was no different in 2025, with brilliant RPGs, new spins on classic franchises, ingenious platformers, and so much more, so there was a lot for us to consider in picking the 10 best games of 2025.

GameSpot's staff comes together annually to vote on the year's best and then discuss the outcome of those results to compile a list of our favorites. Everything from the past 12 months is eligible, including late December releases from the prior year (but not Indiana Jones and the Great Circle; that made 2024's list) and live-service games, which are judged on the merits of their additions and updates during the ye
title: GameSpot's 10 Best Games Of 2025

description:
With the festive season in full swing and many people planning to take a well-deserved break, grabbing a few downloads from the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog sounds like a grand idea. For December, the subscription service is adding 10 more games to its library, including the day-one release of Skate Story, Assassin's Creed action with an old-school flavor, and a colorful RPG adventure in the skies.

Aside from Skate Story, these will all be available starting December 16. See the full list below. In case you missed it, the December free games for PS Plus subscribers--Lego Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, The Outlast Trials, Synduality Echo of Ada, and Neon White--are also available to claim, so make certain to do so before January 5,
title: PlayStation Plus Extra/Premium Games For December 2025 Include Assassins And Skateboarders

description:
The latest GTA Online update, titled "Safehouse in the Hills," has finally arrived and delivers some interesting content with it. The highlight of the update is the return of Michael De Santa, one of the main characters from GTA 5's story mode. Michael has a new mission for you to complete in GTA Online that rewards you with some serious cash, but to start that mission, you'll have to do some setup in Los Santos.

Below, you can see everything you need to do in GTA Online to begin the new Michael mission.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Buying a Mansion from the Safehouse in the Hills update
title: How To Start The Michael Mission In GTA Online's Safehouse In the Hills Update

description:
At the end of October, Rockstar fired over 30 employees at Rockstar North in the United Kingdom and contended that they were let go over "gross misconduct." The Grand Theft Auto developer has since been accused of union busting, since many of the fired devs were either members of the Independent Workers' Union of Great Britain or organizing for it. Now, the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Keir Starmer, and a member of Parliament, are keeping up the pressure on Rockstar.

"It's a deeply concerning case," said Starmer. "Every worker has the right to join a trade union and we're determined to strengthen workers rights and ensure they don't face unfair consequences for being part of a union. Our ministers will look into the particular case the member raises and will keep him updated."

The case was brought up by Edinburgh East and Mussel
title: United Kingdom's Ministers Will "Look Into" Rockstar's Dev Firings, Says Prime Minister

description:
Are you befuddled by the locations of Scout Bots in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond? These derelict machines have been scattered all over the world of Viewros, and some of them are quite hard to find. Still, if you manage to stumble upon these contraptions, then you're in for a treat. That's because they automatically reveal all items and upgrades in a particular zone.

Our guide has all the details that you need. But, before we continue, we need to remind you that Scout Bots can only be activated once you've unlocked the Thunder Shot ability several hours into the campaign. Upon zapping a Scout Bot, scan it to mark the remaining items on your map.</
title: All Scout Bot Locations In Metroid Prime 4: Beyond

description:
Cyberpunk 2077 celebrates its fifth anniversary today, December 10, as the RPG originally launched back on December 10, 2020. It's been a busy, tumultuous five years for the game, and now one of the game's designers, Pawel Sasko, has weighed in with a heartfelt message to mark the milestone.

"I feel nothing but gratitude towards each one of you," he said. "I feel so thankful to be part of this community. I love all the pictures, videos; all the cosplay and mods that you have done for Cyberpunk 2077. It has been an incredible adventure."

He added: "I hope you have enjoyed the stories we have told about the characters we have built. I feel so blessed to be part of this community. I feel so thankful to be able to work on this game and to add something valuable to your lives."
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Celebrates 5th Anniversary With Heartfelt Messages From Developers

description:
Apple has revealed the most-downloaded games on iPhone and iPad for this year, as well as the top Apple Arcade titles. The lists contain quite a few familiar faces--like Fortnite and Minecraft--but Balatro stands out for 2025. That's because the game not only shows up on the paid mobile charts, but it's also No. 3 for Apple Arcade--the subscription service.

Fortnite is No. 2 for free iPhone games and No. 3 for free iPad games. The battle-royale title finally returned to iOS in May in the US after roughly five years, as developer Epic Games and A
title: The Most-Downloaded App Store Games Of 2025 Include Fortnite, Minecraft, And Balatro

description:
An absolute classic is one of two Nintendo 64 games set to join the Nintendo Classics library this month. Rayman 2: The Great Escape and Tonic Trouble, both from Ubisoft, will be available to play for Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack subscribers starting December 17.

Rayman 2 was originally released in 1999 for Nintendo 64 and PC, with ports on Dreamcast, PlayStation, and other platforms following in subsequent years. It was the first 3D outing for Ubisoft's mascot and received acclaim from critics, rivaling Crash Bandicoot, Banjo-Kazooie, and even Super Mario 64.

Tonic Trouble is also an Ubisoft original, though decidedly with a lesser reputation compared to Rayman 2. Designed by Rayman creator Michel Ancel, the action-adventure game depicts a mutated Earth with a ton of colorful and quirky character designs.
title: One Of The Best Nintendo 64 Platformers Is Coming To Nintendo Switch Online

description:
The Fortnite collabs look like they could be off to a strong start next year, with leaks suggesting that a Bleach crossover is coming. According to the leaks, it's set to launch in early 2026 during Chapter 7 Season 1. Since the season is set to end on March 4, the most likely release window is January or February.

First spotted by noted dataminer SamLeakss, the collab could feature not just a character skin but also Ichigo's theme, "Number One." So the skin seems likely to be Ichigo himself.

BLEACH COLLAB GOT LEAKED WHILE I WAS ASLEEP 💀
- Will be released in Early 2026
- Includes at least 1 skin
- "Number One - Bankai" Song <
title: The Next Fortnite Collab Will Reportedly Feature Bleach Characters

description:
Developer Expression Games has released the first gameplay trailer for Hell Let Loose: Vietnam, a hardcore 50v50 first-person shooter set during the Vietnam War. A follow-up to 2021's Hell Let Loose--which was inspired by the conflicts of World War 2--players will have to once again rely on tactical teamwork to survive.

Hell Let Loose: Vietnam will feature six new maps on launch day, each described by Expression Games as a mix of dense jungle, twisting deltas, and deadly open areas. You won't just be fighting on the ground either, as military helicopters serve multiple roles. From troop de
title: Hell Let Loose: Vietnam Gameplay Trailer Shows Just How Explosive 50v50 Jungle Warfare Can Be

description:
Earlier this year, John Romero--the creator of Doom and Quake--announced that his next first-person shooter had been canceled. Although Romero and his company, Romero Games, didn't confirm that the project was a victim of Microsoft's layoffs and cutbacks, one of Romero Games' laid-off employees did. However, it appears the still-unnamed shooter isn't completely dead, according to Romero himself.

During his appearance at Salón del Videojuego de Madrid (via Eurogamer), Romero confirmed that the project is back on, and that it's been given a fresh redesign.

"We're not starting at ground zero," said Romero. "We can take pieces out of and put into a bran
title: John Romero's Canceled Shooter Is Back On Again, Sort Of

description:
After its recent paid expansion, Wishblossom Ranch, Disney Dreamlight Valley is back with another free update for all players to enjoy. This time around, you can finally invite beloved Disney princess Cinderella to your valley and go through her questline to form a new friendship. However, as expected, there's also a fresh Star Path for you to tackle. The Winter Warmth Star Path includes plenty of winter-themed cosmetics, furniture, and more, giving you plenty of fun stuff to decorate your valley with this holiday season.

If you're struggling to figure out how to complete any of the Star Path duties, we've got all of them listed below alongside how to solve them.

All Winter Warmth Star Path duties and how to complete them

  • Buy seeds somewhere frosty - Buy seeds in the Frosted Heights
  • Buy vegetable seeds fit for a ball - Buy Pumpkin seeds
  • Cast around for seafood - Catch an
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley - All Winter Warmth Star Path Duties And How To Complete Them

description:
Cyberpunk 2077 fans can now own a piece of tech that feels and looks like something you'd find at Kiroshi Opticals in Night City. To celebrate the game's fifth anniversary, CD Projekt Red partnered with Viture on limited-edition XR glasses themed around Cyberpunk 2077. The Viture x Cyberpunk 2077 5th Anniversary Collector's Edition XR Glasses are numbered to 10,000 and available to purchase now for $549 on Viture's online storefront and at select major retailers.

Viture Luma Cyber XR Glasses combine the form factor of the Luma Pro ($499) with the technical enhancements found in the
title: Viture Reveals High-Tech Cyberpunk 2077 Limited-Edition XR Glasses

description:
GameStop has released its latest earnings report, shining a light on how the video game retailer is performing in the market--and it was a mixed quarter for the company.

Revenue came in at $821 million, compared to $860.3 million during the same period last year, and short of Wall Street projections. Profit, however, soared from $17.4 million last year to $77.1 million for the latest period. GameStop's stock price sank after the earnings report came out, with many saying the revenue miss was to blame for the falling price.

Others, however, have said GameStop's strong profit-growth, along with having more than $8.8 billion in cash, cash equivalents, and marketable securities (up from $4.6 billion last year) is a sign of health. Additionally, GameStop's Selling, General, and Administrative (SG&A) costs were $221.4 million for the quarter, down from $282 million
title: GameStop Stock Slumps As Games And Hardware Sales Decline

description:
The next video game set for a film/TV adaptation has been announced, and it is developer RubberBandGames' sandbox game Wobbly Life.

The London-based developer has announced a deal with veteran Hollywood producer Adrian Askarieh and his Prime Universe Films company to develop Wobbly Life for film and TV. This does not mean that Wobbly Life will definitely become a film or a TV series, only that the company has secured the rights and may begin the development process.

Prime Universe previously produced the Hitman movies starring Timothy Olyphant and Rupert Friend. Askarieh is also attached to the in-development Hitman TV show in the works now.
title: This Popular Game Pass Game Gets A Movie And TV Deal

description:
Roblox is one of the biggest games in the world, with millions of different experiences that players can hop into. One of the biggest selling points is that it can be played practically anywhere, from phones to Xbox to a standard computer.

Of course, not everyone has a PC rig the size of a monster truck, and some folks just want to know if their old laptop or similar device can run Roblox, or find out why they’re running into issues. So, to help you out, we’re listing the exact Roblox system requirements below.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Roblox Supported Platforms

Roblox Supported Platforms

You can fire up Roblox on almost
title: Roblox System Requirements

description:
Whether it's stalking prey from the shadows or getting in and out without being seen entirely, there's a delightful power fantasy associated with the best stealth games out there. It's a genre that complements so many others, too, combining elegantly with action, puzzle, role-playing, and even turn-based gameplay systems to give them a slightly different spin.

Of course some of the most recognizable in the genre are ones that give you the tools you need to execute your objective in a variety of ways. Nowhere else is this more evident than with IO Interactive's Hitman series, which has traditionally given you a playground to let Agent 47 run rampant through, with a variety of different ways to take out your targets. Ubisoft's Splinter Cell series, by comparison, lets you adopt the role of an apex predator in Sam Fisher, who is as comfortab
title: 18 Of The Best Stealth Games To Sneak Around In Right Now

description:
The Forge is a brand new Roblox experience, which should be great for anyone out there yearning for the mines. Dive below the surface in this subterranean stunt, and uncover ore to craft weapons, armor, and much more. If you’re one of the many miners out there hurling your pickaxe at The Forge, then you will absolutely want to learn all about the latest The Forge codes, which you can find below.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • All The Forge Codes
    • Expired codes

All The Forge Codes

These are all the currently active The Forge codes:

  • FREESPINS - 8 Rerolls and 1 Luck Totem
title: Roblox The Forge codes

description:
With the latest Roblox craze, The Forge, there is just so much content to dig into that it’s tough to know where to begin. Thankfully, we’re here to mark a big X on the right spot for you, breaking down the best of the best when it comes to weapons and races in this underground escapade. So if you’re yearning to explore further in the mine, then our tier lists covering weapons, pickaxes, and races will help.

The Forge Weapon Tier List

As you explore the depths of The Forge, it is very important to pack a formidable weapon, so you can wipe out enemies and grab yourself even more exclusive ore. Ore what? Well, we wouldn’t like to say. So avoid wiping out and waking up on the surface, with our The Forge weapon tier list below:

TierThe Forge Weapon

S

Comically
title: Roblox The Forge Tier List - Best Weapon, Pickaxe, and Race

description:
It's been a busy week for industry speculation after Geoff Keighley started posting about a mysterious, glowing monolith in the middle of the California desert, which was later moved into Los Angeles. Now, it appears the monolith's mystery might have just been solved through a trademark filing.

Rumors that the monolith was erected to tease new Diablo 4 content, Elder Scrolls 6, God of War, or Lords of the Fallen 2 were all shot down by peopl
title: The Mystery Of The Game Awards Monolith Appears To Have Been Spoiled By A Trademark Filing

description:
The Cyberpunk series is getting an official physical trading card game as part of a new collaboration between CD Projekt Red and TCG newcomers WeirdCo. The game will feature characters from across Cyberpunk 2077 and the anime series Edgerunners, while also drawing from the extended Cyberpunk universe to make a TCG that's faithful to the franchise's origins.

IGN reported revealed the upcoming project in an interview with key players from both CD Projekt Red and WeirdCo, who share a mutual passion for bringing Cyberpunk to the TCG space--which will also mark CD Projekt Red's first physical TCG.

"Every one of us at WeirdCo loves the Cyberpunk universe, and we built the TCG bit by bit on this foundation," WeirdCo co-founder Elliot Cook said, revealing that the team looked not only to 2077 and Edgerunners for inspiration, but also the Dark Horse
title: Cyberpunk Is Getting An Official Physical Trading Card Game In Collaboration With CD Projekt Red

description:
Amazon's live action Tomb Raider TV show finally seems to be going ahead after a few false starts, with Game of Thrones alum Sophie Turner in the lead role. Now, reports suggest sci-fi legend Sigourney Weaver is up for a role in the TV adaptation.

Deadline reports that Weaver is circling a role in the upcoming Tomb Raider TV show, though a deal has not yet been closed. It's unknown what role she would play if cast.

Sigourney Weaver has played a part in a number of iconic film franchises, from her breakout role in the Alien series to her more recent appearances in James Cameron's Avatar films--with the latest, Avatar: Fire And Ash, releasing in
title: Sigourney Weaver In Talks To Join Tomb Raider TV Show - Report
